preferences.name: closeNewTabs
preferences.title: Close extra new tabs
preferences.description: Turn this preference on to automatically close New Tabs

preferences.name: closeDuplicates
preferences.title: Close duplicate tabs
preferences.description: Turn this preference on to show notification if current tab is a duplicate and an option to close it

preferences.name: groupTabs
preferences.title: Group domains
preferences.description: Turn this preference on to group tabs by domain name
